title: Massive Ping Spikes Over Past Couple Days
body: The past couple days I've been getting massive ping spikes, and it only happens once out of about 5 games. My ping is currently usually around 80, but in the spikes it goes to over 1000. The highest I've seen it was 5000 I think. For the most part the problem is fixed once I disconnect from the game, then reconnect, but that takes about 5 minutes to do and is hurting my team. All other online activities have been normal. I can stream movies fine, and the spikes haven't been occurring when anybody else was using my home's internet. So, I have no idea how to fix it. Any insights anyone? They'd be greatly appreciated!

replies.body:
Big changes in latency usually indicate there are issues with your network routing to our servers. This can be caused by network rerouting during peak hours for your ISP, or it could be a problematic network hop along the way. Before we look into your network routing, I'd like you to follow our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured for League properly.

Should you still see issues after taking those steps, we can investigate further, just let me know.
